author: amrikw
comment: As described, the best cross-platform Password Manager with cloud sync and free Desktop app. Fast cloud sync on Android, IOS, Mac and latest Windows 10. Can attach resized and cropped images (and files) and still smaller in size. Have imported from Keepass to save re-entry and plus pulls website icons easily. Bought the one-off payment  pro version as loving it so far. Best to install free one first to get the icon shortcut on mobile to open database as found you do not get this with pro install first. With fingerprint unlock and now expiry date (23 Feb 2018) too. Kudos to developer.

author: Ed Hasaba
comment: Works beautifully. There's only a handful of apps I pay for and this is one of them. The import feature they have is EXTREMELY comprehensive and robust. An obscure old manager of mine was discontinued, so I had to switch. SIC was there only one that allowed straightforward import, and I looked at a few before making the jump. Worth the money for sync capabilities to PC.
Can no longer add passwords without purchasing pro version. They don't say if it is a one time fee or annual. Not worth an annual $5 fee, to many other options.
Pleasantly easy to use and accepted all info from a different brand password protector faultlessly. Also the scanned items feature comes in very handy. A winner !!

author: Kevin Richards
comment: Love this app, does everything I've needed or expected. Paid for the pro version for myself and got my whole family setup. Used on multiple devices, switching over was no probelm defs would recommend it to friends & family

author: kirit kansagara
comment: Very excellent application I have used handysafe but this is better can be attached image file  & notes

author: bhaskar chowdhury
comment: I am using this app for 1 years and it's been a great.

author: Steven Johnson
comment: Absolutely love it. Best password manager I have used.

author: JimboMary Harshfield
comment: I am impressed, safe in cloud works very well. I found it was easily able to import my old data. Synchronization works wonderfully!  The one thing I would warn users about is that if you install the free version and later upgrade, make sure all later reinstallations install the same way. Install the free app and it will upgrade to the paid version automatically.  If you later reinstall the paid version, it will not work. Reinstall the same way you purchased.

author: Jack Gotta
comment: It was ok until the fingerprint option didn't work anymore, and there's very little you can do (sync calendar is a basic feature but you can't use it unless you upgrade it to the PAY Pro version. I wouldn't mind to pay for a good working app, but it is not. There are much better apps paying or free.

author: Ankur Jhavery
comment: I like the app and have already purchased the pro version. But please add the feature to club account in collapsible folders on home page of app like done in bitwarden. It is so inconvenient to look for a particular account from so many accounts on app home page. If they can bepit in collapsible folders there, it will be much more convenient to find a particular account by expanding the particular folder carrying it.

Great; The Best Option In Its Category; Definitely Recommended. Specially I found "Autofill in Chrome" feature very useful and weak password indicator feature is very useful too. Only one important issue with the app: When trying to modify a field name in a card/template; the app freezes for about 5 seconds; this happens frequently, but not always. Please fix. Thanks in advance.

author: Geoff Butcher
comment: Exceeded my expectations. I installed this reluctantly to replace Pocket password manager after support for that app ended. However this app is even better than Pocket (good though that was). It's difficult to see how it could be improved. Get it, and definitely pay for the full version.

author: Mark Reid
comment: Bloody awesome! Works a treat on pro! Only reason giving 4 instead of 5 stars is when you start with non pro, then pay, you still have to install via the non-pro installer..... the pro version still remains in Google play as "buy", giving the impression you haven't bought it. Not a major issue but shouldn't buying the app "unlock" the pro installer.... fix that, it goes 5 stars instantly from me :)

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: There is no difference between an upgraded free and the paid versions of the app, but for Google Play store they are different apps. So, you can only install the one you paid for.

author: Tan Swam Ting
comment: No forgot password option. Used to use fingerprint to open apps, but because of no forget password option, need to uninstall and install again.

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: Your password is not stored anywhere for the security reasons and hence cannot be restored. This gives you a full protection from hackers, but this also means that forgotten password will lead to a full data loss.

author: deepanshu sood
comment: This app just works great I have using it on my android device as well as browsers and on my laptop and it doesn't ever disspoint. Very happy with the purchase made and cloud sync works great I have never encountered a problem with it. For persons who can't remember their passwords and someone who likes to keep tough to crack passwords should use it and also it is not as expensive as Lastpass or other password managers

Great password manager but trying to re-instal after purchasing pro version is a nightmare I've already had money taking out my bank for iPad re-instal now it's saying pay for app on phone when I already have. Not easy to contact either

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: Please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com and specify your Google account and order number.

author: Deborah Spidle
comment: I really like the user interface because of simplicity in use and flexibility. It allows to modificaion of what data is stored by adding your own fields and organizing the order.   It has just enough structure as far as defining templates for websites,  credit cards, etc. without tying you in to theirs. I had an issue with syncing after  changing the password (which you have to do manually on every device using the database).  When I wrote in to the developers for support they responded in quick time frame with the answer.  I was able to fix it per their instructions and found out  the database and backups filenames to boot.  Knowing where they are stored makes me more comfortable in managing my own system and feeling that I will actually be able to restore in the event of a disaster crash.  That is something I worry about because when it is usually the first time you find out whether the restore works.  I have not tried it but at least knowing I have a backup file makes me a bit more confident.  NOTE that backups are not automatic.  You have to choose the backup command.  And I didn't even pay anything!

author: Krunal Vyas
comment: Unbelievable product. Amazing functional design. Though two important questions:  1. What if the Application developer decides to retire this application?  2. Is it audited for security? What if developer wrote a code to send copy of my master key & encrypted database to his storage? (2 step authentication using 3rd party, like windows/google authenticator, is must)

author: Dorie Patterson
comment: I lost access to the app, but got it back with the developers help. I love that I can customize the pictures. I bought the complete app so that I can add unlimited apps. I love it!

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: Try to reinstall the app and restore your data from a cloud.

author: Roxx Marino
comment: Great app works perfect!  I been using this app 4 a while and I use in 6 different devices, Mac, iPad, iPhone and Android devices. I use Dropbox to store my database, as a owner of a web company, clients always trust me important passwords and I do have over 600 passwords, so I recommend this app. Thank you!

author: Sherri Owens-Anthony
comment: I love it so far. Creates extremely complex passwords and works very smoothly. I highly recommend the paid version. Very reasonable 'one time' price.

author: TENG RITHOU
comment: អបអរសាទរ! កម្មវិធី Safe In Cloud ជាកម្មវិធីល្អបំផុតសម្រាប់ខ្ញុំក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រង Email, Social Network, My Website Account and Other Card. ដូច្នេះ ខ្ញុំសូមជូនសញ្ញាផ្កាយចំនួន៥ ដល់កម្មវិធីSafeInCloud.★★★★★

author: Ryan Loeffler
comment: Love it! One thing I wish was if it had support for your own NAS and/or AWS S3 for DB storage

author: Adam Stiff
comment: Shame it's so expensive for the premium features. Also no indication as to the encryption strength or type!

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: SafeInCloud uses 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) for the data encryption. More info: https://safeincloud.uservoice.com/knowledgebase/articles/425331-what-encryption-is-used-in-safeincloud

author: CSAMSA
comment: I use it on a daily basis, keeps track of my password and also has a pw generator so you can use it to pick-up strong ones.
I have been using this app for more than a year and is the best so far. I tried others  but this one is easier to use, to backup an restore. I fully recommend it.

author: Rajan Shrestha
comment: hi Iam From Nepal. I like this app. this is trail version and I have not debit or credit card. So how cani I active pro version. Give me idea

author: sassan azizi
comment: I got the pro version, everything works fine for me except auto fill in chrome Android, I also turned on auto fill in chrome accessibility

author: Brandon Bolds
comment: Perfect for its category with a lot of extra features including sync and emailing/saving the file for backup. Worth the buy.

author: Rashid Malik
comment: Forget password setting is wrong.

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: Please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com with a detailed problem description.

author: Isaiah Carlson
comment: I love it! Please add a two factor authentication feature though! It would be nice.

author: Paul Mckenna
comment: Really would like 2 factor authentication feature. I don't bother with finger printing.

author: Ryan Harrison
comment: Love this app! Great way to store and access passwords and other secure information. Excellent!

author: Nico bos
comment: Was good with fingerprint unlock, why the heck did they remove it??

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: Fingerprint unlock is a pro feature. You should upgrade the app to Pro to continue using it.

author: Christy Mullins
comment: Great App once you're able to get it to sync.

reply.author: SafeInCloud
reply.content: I don't quite understand your question. Please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com with details.

author: Rajani Kumar Singh Bondila
comment: Best useful app

author: Eng. V
comment: The best password organizer I've ever used

author: Roger Logan
comment: Best password app I have ever used.

author: exwookie
comment: Well done! With Fingerprint.
